text: KGDL is a radio station on 92.1 FM in Trent, Texas. It is owned by José Antonio Aguilar, through licensee Radio Trent LLC, and carries the La Mejor Regional Mexican format from MVS Radio. KGDL also broadcasts on an FM translator at 105.9 mHz which is owned by Armida A. Saille. ==History== KGDL was licensed in August 2011. It was owned by KM Communications and promptly sold to its current owner before even coming to air. In 2014 and 2015, high winds caused damage to the station's tower. ==External links== Category:Radio stations established in 2012 GDL Category:2012 establishments in Texas GDL
title: KGDL
